fields.name: Roses
fields.description: Symbol of love and passion, popular in romantic arrangements.

fields.name: Tulips
fields.description: Bright spring flowers that represent perfect love and new beginnings.

fields.name: Lilies
fields.description: Elegant flowers often associated with purity and renewal.

fields.name: Sunflowers
fields.description: Large, cheerful flowers symbolizing adoration and loyalty.

fields.name: Daisies
fields.description: Simple and happy flowers representing innocence and purity.

fields.name: Orchids
fields.description: Exotic blooms that symbolize beauty, strength, and luxury.

fields.name: Peonies
fields.description: Lush and fragrant flowers symbolizing prosperity and romance.

fields.name: Chrysanthemums
fields.description: Vibrant flowers associated with friendship and well-wishing.

fields.name: Carnations
fields.description: Long-lasting blooms symbolizing fascination and distinction.

fields.name: Lavenders
fields.description: Fragrant flowers known for calmness, grace, and purity.
